content.rendered:
We’ve received an overwhelming response to the launch of our Business plan. Dozens of creative teams – both small and large – are now collaborating internally, and with outside clients, in a single shared workspace. As a result, these teams are more productive and in-sync than ever before. Today, we’re improving comments to make creative collaboration even better for teams.

Here is a quick overview of what’s improved:

  • When you leave a comment on any file in the team dashboard without tagging anyone, only the owner of that file is notified of your comment.
  • All team members are now added to the address book by default. This allows you to quickly tag specific people in the team to get feedback or approval from them.
  • We’ve introduced a new tag called @team which you can use to notify all team members. This is helpful when you want input from the whole team.

We believe these improvements will reduce notification clutter, improve team collaboration, and keep the team focused on the one thing that matters – doing their best work.
